channel.title: Get a personalized guided tour of OGM Forum
channel.description:
We'd like to help you start using this forum!
Please click on their name to schedule a free videocall tour with one of our **OGM Forum Guides**:
* [@BentleyDavis ](https://bentleydavis.com/schedule) * [@peterkaminski](https://calendly.com/peterkaminski/ogm-forum-intro)
Or click "Reply" and use the "@" sign to mention them here in this thread if you'd like to discuss via the forum instead.

item.title: Get a personalized guided tour of OGM Forum
item.dc:creator: peterkaminski
item.description:
My offer is still the same, and I presume @BentleyDavis’s offer is, as well.

In the background, some of us are working on processes and materials to help OGM members know and use OGM Forum better, but that won’t replace a personal tour for a while.

Read full topic
item.source: Get a personalized guided tour of OGM Forum

item.title: Get a personalized guided tour of OGM Forum

item.description:
curious if this remains current or if it might be updated to reflect the various happenings and updates since this post ?
